title: Spring Rolls
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with vegetables and served with sweet chili sauce.

title: Edamame
description: Steamed young soybeans tossed in sea salt.

title: Gyoza
description: Japanese pan-fried dumplings filled with pork and vegetables.

title: Vegetable Tempura
description: Assorted vegetables lightly battered and fried until crispy.

title: Pad Thai
description: Traditional Thai stir-fried rice noodles with shrimp, tofu, bean sprouts, and crushed peanuts.

title: Sushi Platter
description: Assortment of fresh sushi including salmon, tuna, California rolls, and shrimp tempura rolls.

title: Beef Bulgogi
description: Korean-style marinated beef grilled to perfection and served with steamed rice and kimchi.

title: Peking Duck
description: Crispy roasted duck served with steamed pancakes, hoisin sauce, and sliced scallions.

title: Mango Sticky Rice
description: Sweet sticky rice topped with fresh mango slices and coconut milk.

title: Green Tea Ice Cream
description: Creamy green tea-flavored ice cream served with a drizzle of honey.

title: Red Bean Paste Buns
description: Soft steamed buns filled with sweet red bean paste.

title: Tiramisu
description: Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.
